adm:constants.name: name
adm:constants.description: The human-readable name of the ADM.

adm:constants.name: organization
adm:constants.description: The name of the issuing organization of the ADM

adm:externally-defined-data.name: ion_version
adm:externally-defined-data.description: This is the version of ion is that currently installed.

adm:tables.name: exits
adm:tables.description: This table lists all of the exits that are defined in the IPN database for the local node.

adm:tables.name: plans
adm:tables.description: This table lists all of the egress plans that are established in the IPN database for the local node.

adm:controls.name: exit_add
adm:controls.description: This control establishes an "exit" for static default routing.

adm:controls.name: exit_change
adm:controls.description: This control changes the gateway node number for the exit identified by firstNodeNbr and lastNodeNbr.

adm:controls.name: exit_del
adm:controls.description: This control deletes the exit identified by firstNodeNbr and lastNodeNbr.

adm:controls.name: plan_add
adm:controls.description: This control establishes an egress plan for the bundles that must be transmitted to the neighboring node that is identified by it's nodeNbr.

adm:controls.name: plan_change
adm:controls.description: This control changes the duct expression for the indicated plan.

adm:controls.name: plan_del
adm:controls.description: This control deletes the egress plan for the node that is identified by it's nodeNbr.
